direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve querying order-related information but for different aspects (trade history vs. order status).
Both methods send signed requests with similar parameter handling and request structures.
Both methods interact with the Binance API to retrieve or manipulate order-related data.
Both methods handle optional parameters and may throw similar exceptions related to parameter validation.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized with the necessary credentials and proxy settings.

enhanced_by.method_name: sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The orderStatus method relies on the sendSignedRequest method to execute the API call, making it a critical dependency.
Both methods need to verify the response from the API, ensuring the data is correctly formatted and free of errors.
